languages.text: {n}Виночерпий снова наполняет кубок. Неожиданно проникновенно взглянув вам в глаза, он вздыхает:{/n} "Пусть вы, в отличие от прочих, всегда будете хозяином своей судьбы".
{n}The cup-bearer refills your goblet. Then, with a sudden soulfulness, he looks into your eyes and sighs,{/n} "May you, unlike the rest, always be the {mf|master|mistress} of your fate."
languages.original_text: {n}Виночерпий снова наполняет кубок. Неожиданно проникновенно взглянув вам в глаза, он вздыхает:{/n} "Пусть вы, в отличие от прочих, всегда будете хозяином своей судьбы".

traits.locale_text: {n}The cup-bearer refills your cup. Then, with a sudden soulfulness, he looks into your eyes and sighs,{/n} "May you, unlike the others, always be the {mf|master|mistress} of your fate."
{n}The cup-bearer refills your cup. Then, with a sudden soulfulness, he looks into your eyes and sighs,{/n} "May you, unlike the others, always be the {mf|master|mistress} of your fate."
{n}The cup-bearer refills your vessel. Then, with a sudden soulfulness, he looks into your eyes and sighs,{/n} "May you, unlike the others, always be the {mf|master|mistress} of your fate."
{n}The cup-bearer refills your vessel. Then, with a sudden soulfulness, he looks into your eyes and sighs,{/n} "May you, unlike the others, always be the {mf|master|mistress} of your fate."
{n}The cup-bearer refills your goblet. Then, with a sudden soulfulness, he looks into your eyes and sighs,{/n} "May you, unlike the rest, always be the {mf|master|mistress} of your fate."
{n}The cup-bearer refills your goblet. Then, with a sudden soulfulness, he looks into your eyes and sighs,{/n} "May you, unlike the rest, always be the {mf|master|mistress} of your fate."

languages.text: {n}侍者再次给你斟满美酒，之后忽然饱含深情地看着你的双眼，叹了口气。{/n}“愿您永远都是您命运的主人，永远与其他人截然不同。”
languages.original_text: {n}The cup-bearer refills your goblet. Then, with a sudden soulfulness, he looks into your eyes and sighs,{/n} "May you, unlike the rest, always be the {mf|master|mistress} of your fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}侍者再次给你斟满美酒，之后忽然饱含深情地看着你的双眼，叹了口气。{/n}“愿您永远都是您命运的主人，永远与其他人截然不同。”

languages.text: {n}給仕が杯に酒を注いだ。すると彼は、突如として物思いにふけったような面持ちであなたの目を見つめ、ため息まじりにこう言った。{/n}「どうか、他の人たちと違って、あなた様はずっと運命の主でありますように」
languages.original_text: {n}The cup-bearer refills your goblet. Then, with a sudden soulfulness, he looks into your eyes and sighs,{/n} "May you, unlike the rest, always be the {mf|master|mistress} of your fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}給仕が杯に酒を注いだ。すると彼は、突如として物思いにふけったような面持ちであなたの目を見つめ、ため息まじりにこう言った。{/n}「どうか、他の人たちと違って、あなた様はずっと運命の主でありますように」

languages.text: {n}El paje rellena tu copa. Entonces, con un repentino sentimentalismo, te mira a los ojos y suspira:{/n} «Ojalá usted, a diferencia de los demás, sea siempre {mf|el|la} artífice de su propio destino».
languages.original_text: {n}The cup-bearer refills your goblet. Then, with a sudden soulfulness, he looks into your eyes and sighs,{/n} "May you, unlike the rest, always be the {mf|master|mistress} of your fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}El paje rellena tu copa. Entonces, con un repentino sentimentalismo, te mira a los ojos y suspira:{/n} «Ojalá usted, a diferencia de los demás, sea siempre {mf|el|la} artífice de su propio destino».

languages.text: {n}Saki, kadehini yeniden dolduruyor. Ardından ani bir içtenlikle gözlerinin içine bakıp iç çekiyor.{/n} "Umarım başkalarının aksine daima kaderinizin efendisi olursunuz."
languages.original_text: {n}The cup-bearer refills your goblet. Then, with a sudden soulfulness, he looks into your eyes and sighs,{/n} "May you, unlike the rest, always be the {mf|master|mistress} of your fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Saki, kadehini yeniden dolduruyor. Ardından ani bir içtenlikle gözlerinin içine bakıp iç çekiyor.{/n} "Umarım başkalarının aksine daima kaderinizin efendisi olursunuz."

languages.text: {n}Ayant à nouveau rempli votre gobelet, l'échanson vous regarde droit dans les yeux avec une intensité soudaine et soupire : {/n}« Puissiez-vous, contrairement aux autres, rester toujours {mf|maître|maîtresse} de votre destinée. »
languages.original_text: {n}The cup-bearer refills your goblet. Then, with a sudden soulfulness, he looks into your eyes and sighs,{/n} "May you, unlike the rest, always be the {mf|master|mistress} of your fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ayant à nouveau rempli votre gobelet, l'échanson vous regarde droit dans les yeux avec une intensité soudaine et soupire : {/n}« Puissiez-vous, contrairement aux autres, rester toujours {mf|maître|maîtresse} de votre destinée. »

languages.text: {n}Der Mundschenk füllt deinen Becher wieder auf. Dann blickt er dir mit einer plötzlichen Beseeltheit in die Augen und seufzt:{/n} "Möget Ihr im Gegensatz zum Rest stets {mf|Meister|Meisterin} Eures Schicksals bleiben."
languages.original_text: {n}The cup-bearer refills your goblet. Then, with a sudden soulfulness, he looks into your eyes and sighs,{/n} "May you, unlike the rest, always be the {mf|master|mistress} of your fate."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Mundschenk füllt deinen Becher wieder auf. Dann blickt er dir mit einer plötzlichen Beseeltheit in die Augen und seufzt:{/n} "Möget Ihr im Gegensatz zum Rest stets {mf|Meister|Meisterin} Eures Schicksals bleiben."
